title: Su Majestad
overview: Spain, year 2024. Pilar is a young Princess and future Queen of Spain who, suddenly and hastily, is forced to lead the institution after a scandal involving her father King Alfonso XIV takes him out of the public eye for a few months. Pilar must prove to the country that she is not the irresponsible, insolent, lazy and useless woman that everyone believes her to be. The thing is, they might be right.
